name: Check error message when mandatory fields are left empty -- @1.1

steps.name: Given the user is on the Sign Up Page
When user clicks on the Sign up button
Then user should able to see "First Name is required!" error message for firstname
Then user should able to see "Last Name is required!" error message for lastname
Then user should able to see "Email is required!" error message for email
Then user should able to see "Password is required!" error message for Password
Then user should able to see "Please accept Terms & Conditions!" for terms and conditions

fullName: Sign Up and Confirm Email Functionality: Check error message when mandatory fields are left empty

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Sign Up and Confirm Email Functionality
